thread.title: NFF-FIFA player's hostel: Sodje hails Gusau, board - Blueprint Newspapers Limited
thread.title_full: NFF-FIFA player's hostel: Sodje hails Gusau, board - Blueprint Newspapers Limited

author: About Abdullahim Admin
title: NFF-FIFA player's hostel: Sodje hails Gusau, board - Blueprint Newspapers Limited
text:
Former Nigeria international, Sam Sodje has congratulated the President of Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) Alhaji Ibrahim Gusau and the entire executive board members.
on the groundbreaking ceremony of the NFF/FIFA Players’ Hostel and Training Pitches held yesterday at the NFF Secretariat, Abuja.
In a statement made available Wednesday to our correspondent ,Sodje on behalf of Delta Sports Commission thumbs up the landmark project marks as a significant milestone in the development of Nigerian football infrastructure.
“The vision and commitment demonstrated in bringing this initiative to life will undoubtedly contribute to the growth of the game and provide the necessary support for our players to thriv”.
“We also commend the Speaker of the Federal House of Representatives, Rt. Hon. Tajudeen Abass, alongside other top government functionaries and ex-national team players, for their support in making this project a reality”.
“I wish you continued success in your efforts to elevate Nigerian football to greater heights” the statement reads
